channel.title: Mega help needed!
channel.description:
[u]i need a lot of help[/u]
first of all i use hyrbridscape default server
im a newb to this stuff!!!!!! :D
i need alot of help
questions are as follows:-
how do i fix the items for d2h tzhaar items and infinity and any new items????? how do i edit npcs names and place stuff in horviks shop???? how can i change my combat level past 126??? is there anyfing i need to download???? how can i make range and mage work and ancients?????? how can i get specials and make attacking look normal???? how can i make npcs sell my own stuff??? how can i change npcs levels and actually make it work???? how can i change examine description????? how can i place objects such as fountains crates????? any other useful stuff????
and a big thanks to all those people who help me out ;D ;D ;D ;D ;) ;) ;)[br][size=1]Posted at: November 13, 2006, 03:33:37 PM[/size][hr]anyone??[br][size=1]Posted at: November 13, 2006, 04:07:31 PM[/size][hr]please!!!!

item.description:
@tekken_lord wrote:

oh ok thankyou ;)[br][size=1]Posted at: November 13, 2006, 04:15:45 PM[/size][hr]more help aprreciated!!!
